Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
@Zoroaster https://support.komodoplatform.com/support/solutions/articles/29000029930-install-komodoocean-on-mac
install ocean, let it sync
then follow litemode instructions to transfer all native KMD to litemode verus wallet
then backup the wallet.dat and don't use it except to dump privkeys if needed
then vreate new wallet,dat in ocean and send litemode KMD from Verus agama to ocean wallet(native)
or skip last step if you want to use litemode
